I can't judge this game by it's shortnes, (can be finished in 2h) because it was made by 6 students in less than 2 years. Portal game mechanics are cool af. Even though Portal is almost (they both are placed in the same universe) completely different from Half Life 2, it feels more like a mod for Half Life 2. It is definitely worth buying when it's on sale because then it costs only 1 eur. I totally recommend buying this game. 9/10
The game may be 11 years old, a classic that any other gamer has to play at least once

Please do yourself a favor and don't make the mistake that I did by playing Portal 2 before playing this game. It somewhat ruined the experience for me, but I still enjoyed it a lot. Everything about Portal is perfect, with my only criticism being that it's too short.

[h1][b]Portal.[/b][/h1]

[h1]Resumen:[/h1]

Tanto Portal como Portal 2 [b]no son s√≥lo juegos de portales[/b].
Se destacan por sus [b]magn√≠ficas historias y un villano excelente[/b], meti√©ndote completamente en el drama y queriendo pasar todos los niveles con ansias. Cada nivel es un [i]arcade[/i] completamente nuevo que requerir√° de toda tu [b]capacidad intelectual[/b] para superarlo. Por suerte y para ello, contaremos con una pistola de portales con los cuales tendremos que hacer todo lo que se nos ocurra para llegar hasta la salida.

[h1]En profundidad:[/h1]

Para jugar al segundo no hace falta jugar al primero, para disfrutar su historia s√≠.
Seremos una ‚Äúrata de laboratorio humana‚Äù y nos usar√°n para hacer sus pruebas dentro de una [b]organizaci√≥n futurista[/b]. Al final, un giro inesperado cambia la situaci√≥n y habr√° que sobrevivir como se pueda.
Jugarlo en modo cooperativo tambi√©n ser√° una posibilidad (fuera de la historia del juego) que indudablemente tendr√°s que probar si decides comprar el juego, ya que ofrece nuevos niveles y diversi√≥n multiplicada, requiriendo estos de cuatro portales para ser pasados (en su mayor√≠a).

[h1]Valoraci√≥n:[/h1]

Si te gustan los juegos de l√≥gica, [i]arcade[/i], pensar y [b]resolver problemas[/b], este juego te va a encantar. Si bien la calidad gr√°fica es excelente, no requiere de la m√°s actual computadora para ser jugado con fluidez.

[quote=Kruwps]Mi puntuaci√≥n final (teniendo en cuenta: imagen, jugabilidad, optimizaci√≥n, historia, objetivo, contenido, horas jugables): [u]75/100[/u].[/quote]

Un buen juego para pasar el rato. Me he pasado el juego como en 2h ( aunque lo haya jugado poco , me ha encantado).
Recomendado 10/10

This game is great.  Good puzzles that have multiple solutions depending on how efficient you want to be.  You are rewarded for outside the box thinking and abusing the physics of the game to meet your goals.

I cannot think of one negative thing to say about this game.  The story is amazing and funny, the game play is spot on, I have not seen or even heard of any bugs or glitches that make it unplayable and the difficulty is exactly where it needs to be.

10/10.  This is a classic and if you have somehow not played it do so immediately.

Pros: 
- Interesting story and atmosphere
- Very fun gameplay and entertaining puzzles, utilising portals, turrets and energy ball challenges in clever and creative ways
- Challenging bonus levels that have more advanced challenges for skilled players

Cons:
- The main game is quite short (Took me roughly 3 hours to beat the main game and about an hour for the advanced levels [have not yet finished the level challenges])
- Some occasional freezes and stutters

Overall, highly recommended!

Fue un juego incre√≠ble. Los puzzles son ingeniosos e interesantes, aunque debo admitir que pas√© algunos niveles sin saber que hac√≠a. A√∫n as√≠, es muy interesante y el final es hasta extra√±o pero concuerda.

This game.

Oh my god.

It is so amazing, I cannot even begin to describe it. The concept is amazing, and the way that the idea is executed is even better. 5 hours of challenging puzzles, with a pretty funny story to accompany it, and to wrap it all up, you could run it on a potato. Graphics are okay, but it was released in 2007, so, what do you expect.

Get it.

Immmediately.

An almost perfect game. Right when you start to get a little bored, it shakes things up, and ends perfectly. A game that makes you think, and although the story is short, it's definatly worth the dollar I put into it. A must have for your library, and c'mon, it's a dollar right now, might as well if for some reason you still haven't played it.

Honestly one of the best games I have ever played, besides Portal 2, heyoo.
